com.github.peterbencze.serritor.api

Class CrawlerWithSecuredWebApi

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.github.peterbencze.serritor.api.Crawler
      • com.github.peterbencze.serritor.api.CrawlerWithSecuredWebApi

  • public abstract class CrawlerWithSecuredWebApi
extends Crawler
    A crawler implementation with secured web API support. It allows users to register HTTP and WebSocket endpoints that can be used to interact with the crawler while it is running. Users are required to authenticate before they can access restricted endpoints (if they are authorized to do so).

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Modifier Constructor and Description

      Base constructor which sets up the web server and the crawler with the provided configurations.
      protected CrawlerWithSecuredWebApi(ServerConfiguration serverConfig, AccessControlConfiguration accessControlConfig, CrawlerState state)
      Base constructor which sets up the web server with the provided configuration and restores the crawler to the given state.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      protected void addHttpEndpoint(HttpMethod httpMethod, String path, HttpHandler handler)
      Adds an HTTP endpoint to the web API that is accessible to anyone (regardless of if they are authenticated or not).
      protected void addHttpEndpoint(HttpMethod httpMethod, String path, Set<String> allowedRoles, HttpHandler handler)
      Adds an HTTP endpoint to the web API that is only accessible for users who are authenticated and have any of the roles specified.
      protected void addWebSocketEndpoint(String path, Set<String> allowedRoles, WebSocketHandler handler)
      Adds a WebSocket endpoint to the web API that is only accessible for users who are authenticated and have any of the roles specified.
      protected void addWebSocketEndpoint(String path, WebSocketHandler handler)
      Adds a WebSocket endpoint to the web API that is accessible to anyone (regardless of if they are authenticated or not).
      AccessControlConfiguration getAccessControlConfiguration()
      Returns the access control configuration.
      protected Set<org.eclipse.jetty.websocket.api.Session> getOpenWebSocketSessions(Class<? extends WebSocketHandler> socketHandlerClass)
      Returns a set of open WebSocket sessions that represent connections to the specific endpoint.
      ServerConfiguration getServerConfiguration()
      Returns the configuration of the web server.

      Callback which gets called when the crawler starts.
      protected void onStop()
